data.actual_result: It shows the wrong information (cog menu).
data.expected_result: It should say something like "Users with manage messages can pin messages from the 3 dots (or whatever it's called now).
data.short_description: Desktop - if there are no pins, the text in the "Pro Tip" area mentions pinning from a "cog menu" but it's 3 dots now.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a text channel with no pinned messages - Click the Pin menu - Read the text at the bottom that says "Pro Tip" - Realize that there's no cog menu anymore, but the 3 dots on each line of chat.
